  • Class 
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: namespace Instagram\Entities;
  4: 
  5: use Instagram\Http\Response;
  6: 
  7: /**
  8:  * Location
  9:  *
 10:  * @package    Instagram
 11:  * @author     Hassan Khan <contact@hassankhan.me>
 12:  * @link       https://github.com/hassankhan/instagram-sdk
 13:  * @license    MIT
 14:  */
 15: class Location extends AbstractEntity
 16: {
 17: 
 18:     /**
 19:      * Get information about a location.
 20:      *
 21:      * @param string $id  ID of the location
 22:      *
 23:      * @return Response
 24:      *
 25:      * @link https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/locations/#get_locations
 26:      */
 27:     public function get($id)
 28:     {
 29:         return $this->client->request('GET', "locations/$id");
 30:     }
 31: 
 32:     /**
 33:      * Get a list of recent media objects from a given location.
 34:      *
 35:      * @param string      $id     ID of the location
 36:      * @param string|null $minId  Return media before this min_id
 37:      * @param string|null $maxId  Return media after this max_id
 38:      *
 39:      * @return Response
 40:      *
 41:      * @link https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/locations/#get_locations_media_recent
 42:      */
 43:     public function getRecentMedia($id, $minId = null, $maxId = null)
 44:     {
 45:         $params = ['query' => [
 46:             'min_id' => $minId,
 47:             'max_id' => $maxId,
 48:         ]];
 49:         return $this->client->request('GET', "locations/$id/media/recent", $params);
 50:     }
 51: 
 52:     /**
 53:      * Search for a location by geographic coordinate.
 54:      *
 55:      * @param int $latitude   Latitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lng is required
 56:      * @param int $longitude  Longitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lat is required
 57:      * @param int $distance   The distance in metres. Default is 1000m (distance=1000), max distance is 5km.
 58:      *
 59:      * @return Response
 60:      *
 61:      * @link https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/locations/#get_locations_search
 62:      */
 63:     public function search($latitude, $longitude, $distance = 1000)
 64:     {
 65:         $params = ['query' => [
 66:             'lat'      => $latitude,
 67:             'lng'      => $longitude,
 68:             'distance' => $distance,
 69:         ]];
 70: 
 71:         return $this->client->request('GET', 'locations/search', $params);
 72:     }
 73: 
 74:     /**
 75:      * Search for a location by geographic coordinate.
 76:      *
 77:      * @param int $facebookPlacesId  A Facebook Places ID
 78:      *
 79:      * @return Response
 80:      *
 81:      * @link https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/locations/#get_locations_search
 82:      */
 83:     public function searchByFacebookPlacesId($facebookPlacesId)
 84:     {
 85:         $params = ['query' => ['facebook_places_id' => $facebookPlacesId]];
 86:         return $this->client->request('GET', 'locations/search', $params);
 87:     }
 88: 
 89:     /**
 90:      * Search for a location by geographic coordinate.
 91:      *
 92:      * @param string $foursquareId  A Foursquare V2 API location ID
 93:      *
 94:      * @return Response
 95:      *
 96:      * @link https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/locations/#get_locations_search
 97:      */
 98:     public function searchByFoursquareId($foursquareId)
 99:     {
100:         $params = ['query' => ['foursquare_v2_id' => $foursquareId]];
101:         return $this->client->request('GET', 'locations/search', $params);
102:     }
103: }
